name: How The Heck Do I Become A Space Captain
name_original: How The Heck Do I Become A Space Captain
description:
How The Heck Do I Become A Space Captain is a strategy game developed by ORTIGA. It came out on 30-10-2022.
How The Heck Do I Become A Space Captain is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
